Posts.Content: How do I start! 4 days ago my life was turned upside down, not just for me but my family too, I'm struggling to process everything and the Â to make the hard decisions I am now faced with, I am normally quite a strong person but I'm really struggling. Close friends had amazing support from Macmillan when faced with their mountain to climb.
Posts.Title: Just been diagnosed with DCIS, lost afraid, numb!!!
